Node.definition: = title used to address a person (male if in singular) who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if he were the speaker's child
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
literally: to bend (one's) ear; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a conscious effort to listen to what (other) humans say
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= action by which humans or deities persist in a certain activity
= human power or ability to devise a plan or strategy to accomplish a certain goal
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly
= action by which humans persist in a certain activity
= virgin honey (דְּבַשׁ) dripping straight from the honeycomb; ≈ regarded as very desirable food of high quality
literally: outsider (woman); = a woman who is the wife of someone else
literally: to be smooth; hence: = state in which an event appears to be well intentioned, though actually being insincere

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= action by which humans utter words; ≈ associated with the palate
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
literally: bitter; hence: = state in which humans have a character that causes other humans to be in deep distress
= juice from the leaves of the wormwood plant, ► which tastes bitter and can be poisonous; used as medicine; ≈ associated with injustice and suffering
= pertaining to having a thin cutting edge; ► in order to make it useful and effective as a tool; ≈ often associated with aggression and danger
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet

Node.gloss: to go down (to the netherworld)|to die
Node.definition: literally: to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = process by which humans die and descend into the world of the dead
= abode of the dead; ≈ considered to be a remote place, deep in the earth, with power over humankind, without remembrance, without praising God

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= title used to address a person (male if in singular) who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if he were the speaker's child
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= state in which humans, deities, animals and plants are respected by others, implying beauty, vigor and authority
= pertaining to being without mercy towards humans and animals
literally: to be satisfied; hence: = action by which humans take possession of objects until they are satisfied
= a person considered as not belonging to a certain group, be it religious, ethnic, or social
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= action by which humans have to make a strong physical effort to complete a specific task, for one's own benefit or in service to another
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
= action by which humans make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion

Node.gloss: to be ravaged|to be consumed|to waste away
Node.definition: literally: to be finished; hence: = process by which objects are heavily damaged to the extent that they are almost gone
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

= causative action by which deities offer primarily verbal instruction to humans, which may occasionally be accompanied by physical punishment, given as a result of misbehavior or to prevent misbehavior, ► aimed to teach the receiver (and sometimes other people as well) wisdom and good behavior
= action by which someone speaks in order to defend oneself or to accuse someone else; sometimes accompanied by actions
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events, often caused by pride and contempt
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= someone who imparts knowledge to other people
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing
literally: to bend (one's) ear; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a conscious effort to listen to what (other) humans say
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern

= hole in the ground that reaches underground water; ◄ usually manmade, dug out of the ground, or hewn from rock, but may also be naturally occurring; ► used for accessing, collecting and storing water; used by shepherds as a source of water for their animals; ≈ regarded as a source of life because of its water; sometimes used as a metaphor for a woman, possibly based on the physical resemblance of the well to the vagina and its connotation as a source of life
= process by which water flows from a spring; ≈ only used figuratively to refer to human semen flowing from the body
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= a relatively large quantity of liquid flowing with strength
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= a person considered as not belonging to a certain group, be it religious, ethnic, or social
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= the period of a person's life between childhood and adulthood
= female of אַיָּל (אַיָּל)
= state of having a type of beauty that inspires feelings of affection in someone else

Node.gloss: female ibex|female mountain goat|female wild goat
Node.definition: = female ibex (יָעֵל)
= state in which someone or something is physically attractive; ► which may bring about a favorable attitude in others
= the pair of mammae on the chest of human females; ≈ only used in the context of sexual pleasure
literally: at all time; = a long stretch of time, without any interruptions
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so
= action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so
literally: outsider (woman); = a woman who is the wife of someone else
= title used to address a person (male if in singular) who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if he were the speaker's child
= action by which humans put their arms around someone else ► as a greeting, a sign of affection, or during love making

= front of the body of a human being, which, when a person is sitting down, forms a kind of platform that can be used for activities like throwing the lot, and that can even function as a sitting place for someone else, like a pet animal, a child or a beloved one; ≈ symbolizes affection and intimacy, and sometimes represents the entire person
literally: foreign woman; = a woman who is the wife of someone else

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= rope tied into a noose, attached to the other end to a bent bough or small tree that springs upright and tightens the noose around the victim when the trap is sprung; ► used for hunting animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= causative action by which deities offer primarily verbal instruction to humans, which may occasionally be accompanied by physical punishment, given as a result of misbehavior or to prevent misbehavior, ► aimed to teach the receiver (and sometimes other people as well) wisdom and good behavior
= state of being regarded as foolish, ◄ because of lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal one's temper
= action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so
